definition: texture/grain (of wood)/inner essence/intrinsic order/reason/logic/truth/science/natural science (esp. physics)/to manage/to pay attention to/to run (affairs)/to handle/to put in order/to tidy up

pinyin: ge4 ren2 shu4 zi4 zhu4 li3

sentences.english: That's the lowest -ranking officer position in most banks.
sentences.chinese: 助理司庫是大多數銀行中主管級別中最低的一級。

sentences.english: Volunteer to coach or assistant coach a kids sports team.
sentences.chinese: 志願去做孩子們的運動隊教練，或是教練助理。

sentences.english: Yesterday, protesters smashed cars carrying the prime minister and his aides.
sentences.chinese: 昨天，示威者搗破載着總理及其助理的汽車。

sentences.english: Ray Cheung is a senior associate at the World Resources Institute's Markets and Enterprise Program.
sentences.chinese: 張智康，世界資源研究所市場與企業項目高級助理。

sentences.english: Want to be an assistant judge or notary.
sentences.chinese: 想成爲一名助理法官或公證人。

sentences.english: Assistant General Manager of a five-star hotel in Shenzhen.
sentences.chinese: 深圳某五星級酒店總經理助理。

sentences.english: Ms. Zhou Yali, Assistant Manager, Wuhan Arts and Crafts Industry Company.
sentences.chinese: 周雅麗女士，武漢工藝美術工業公司助理經理。

sentences.english: Assistant directors often have to direct the extras in the background.
sentences.chinese: 助理導演總是得指揮背景裏的羣衆演員。

sentences.english: so I decided to pursue a job as a paralegal at a law firm.
sentences.chinese: 所以我決定去一家律師事務所找一份律師助理的工作。

sentences.english: The post also included contact information with the assistant to the publisher.
sentences.chinese: 文章中還公佈了報刊發行助理的聯繫方式。

sentences.english: Then, give you units of the Personnel Section on the.
sentences.chinese: 我是本公司的人事科助理經理。

sentences.english: We want a cook, a library assistant and a sports coach.
sentences.chinese: 我們想找一個廚師，一個圖書館助理和一名體育教練。

sentences.english: Dr Matthew Stephenson, Assistant Professor, Harvard Law School.
sentences.chinese: 斯蒂芬森馬修博士，助理教授，哈佛大學法學院。

sentences.english: Assistant to the General Manager of Shenzhen Petrochemical Industrial Corporation Ltd.
sentences.chinese: 深圳石油化工集團股份無限公司總經理助理。

definition: stage/proscenium/foreground in politics etc (sometimes derog.)/front desk/reception desk/(computing) front-end/foreground
head/director (of an organizational unit)/(police) commissioner/inspector-general/rank of local governor in Tang dynasty administration
